mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.team_name, t.description, t.invite_code, t.creator_id, t.created_at, t.updated_at FROM teams t INNER JOIN team_members tm ON t.id = tm.team_id WHERE tm.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teams (team_name, description, invite_code, creator_id) VALUES (#{teamName}, #{description}, #{inviteCode}, #{creatorId})
